channel.title: Enchantment on HIST1900A
channel.description: Recent content in Enchantment on HIST1900A

item.title: Week 6 Networks and Simulations
item.description: Goals Listen Read Do Reflect Report Back In the podcast episode, I talk about what it is I find ’enchanting’ about digital archaeology. A lot of that concerns the idea of ’emergence’, that if things are connected together like this then interesting unpredictable things might emerge at a higher level of complexity. Therefore, we’ll spend time with networks: first to represent archaeological data, and then as a substrate for computing archaeological data.
